name: JOKE_API__GET_RANDOM_JOKE
description: Fetches a random joke from any category. You can optionally filter out jokes with certain flags (e.g., nsfw, religious).

query.description: Optional query parameters to filter the joke.

blacklistFlags.description: A comma-separated list of flags to blacklist (e.g., 'nsfw,religious,political').

type.description: The type of joke to get: 'single' or 'twopart'.

name: JOKE_API__GET_JOKE_BY_CATEGORY
description: Fetches a joke from a specific category (e.g., 'Programming', 'Pun', 'Spooky').

category.description: The category of joke. Available: Programming, Misc, Dark, Pun, Spooky, Christmas.

query.description: Optional query parameters to filter the joke.

blacklistFlags.description: A comma-separated list of flags to blacklist (e.g., 'nsfw,religious,political').

type.description: The type of joke to get: 'single' or 'twopart'.
